subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|初%雪|はつ%ゆき}}: the first snow
* {{ja-r|初%心|しょ%しん}}: original intention
* {{ja-r|初%心%者|しょ%しん%しゃ}}: beginner
* {{ja-r|最%初|さい%しょ}}: first
* {{ja-r|初%速%度|しょ%そく%ど}}: initial velocity
* {{ja-r|初%夏|しょ%か}}: the beginning of summer
* {{ja-r|初%春|しょ%しゅん}}: the beginning of spring
* {{ja-r|初%秋|しょ%しゅう}}: the beginning of autumn
* {{ja-r|初%冬|しょ%とう}}: the beginning of winter
* {{ja-r|初%誕%生|はつ%たん%じょう}}: first birthday
* {{ja-r|初%々しい|うい%ういし.い}}: innocent
